The blue phoenix bot then=
 heads out of the building. He had taken this 
mode from a previous mission=

time, it was more a normal bird mode=
. But, with his reformatting and 
his inclusion of techno-cells, he became =
a more powerful phoenix. And 
he was very happy with it.

Tyrael: Naga has =
worked with me at the start of my career. We both 
served under captain Opi=
um in the 10th striker team. We were called 
the Deadly Poisons. After that=

time, him as a snake, and me as th=
is phoenix form you see. I think it 
would be proper to have a name for thi=
s unit; it would boost the 
troops morale. Do you have any ideas?

He conti=
nued walking towards the campground, which was about 2 
kilometers away.
